title: Venezuela : gender gap index 2014 to 2018
summary: This graph presents the gender gap Index in Venezuela from 2014 to 2018 .
In 2018 , Venezuela scored 0.71 points , which shows a gender gap of approximately 28 % ( women are 28 % less likely than men to have equal opportunities ) .
In 2018 , the gender gap in the area of political empowerment in Venezuela amounted to 69 % .
